skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Learn HTML and CSS for structure and styling, add responsiveness and interactivity with JavaScript, and use Git and tools like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: For backend development, focus on Node.js for server-side JavaScript, Express for building web applications, and MongoDB for managing databases.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI design focuses on the visual layout, while UX design ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Web flow development involves creating and managing the structure and functionality of a website, including how users navigate between pages and interact with content.
